original_title: Light The Torch - You Will Be the Death of Me Album Release Livestream
overview: Light The Torch Presents: You Will Be The Death of Me - Album Release Livestream. Featuring a full live set including many never before performed songs from the new album. Friday June 25, 2021 - 7pm EDT. Tickets, VIP and limited edition merch bundles available NOW via our official webstore, starting at just $12!
title: Light The Torch - You Will Be the Death of Me Album Release Livestream
